indicator_name: Foreign direct investment, official development assistance and South-South cooperation as a proportion of gross national income
target_name: Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD), Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals metadata for target 17.3
change_notice: This indicator was added following indicator changes from the United Nations 2020 Comprehensive Review. The indicator it replaced has been archived.
